header_text: At yoga class, you struggle to balance in your poses. Anxiety grips you as you worry about your ability to continue physical activities in the future. However, you modify poses, focus on breathing, and prove to yourself that you can adapt.

elements.Text: Can you still benefit from yoga?

elements.name: At yoga class, you struggle to balance in your poses. Anxiety grips you as you worry about your ability to continue physical activities in the future. However, you modify poses, focus on breathing, and prove to yourself that you can adapt._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
